The results of the tests and procedures done to diagnose craniopharyngioma are used to help make decisions about treatment.,CancerGov,Childhood Craniopharyngioma
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Childhood Craniopharyngioma ?,"Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinical trial.
